subject: Missing all three pedals.
description_text:
Hello this is Tyler Jackson, I ordered the pro x ultra pedals along with the plate and 2 of the vibration motors. I received the plate board and both of the vibration motors, but I did not receive the pedals. I also included pictures of what I received and the boxes they came in as well as the order information.

Ordered from Amazon
Order Number - 114-4052184-1243453
Tracking Number - SF6047103357534

conversations.body_text: Hi Tyler Jackson,    Hi, your order 114-4052184-1243453  from SIMSONN was sent out in 3 packages. The tracking number for the PRO X Ultra Pedals is 886909841332  (ships from US warehouse, the shipping carrier is FedEx, you can track it via https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack )
